DEMO

This demo illustrates keyboard accessibility versus screen reader keyboard accessibility, derived by a (windows SR's only) distinction between document mode vs application mode.

These two SR modes are triggered by semantics.

DEMO Instructions (Windows only)

  1. Keybaord accessibility
    • If on, turn off your screen reader
    • Tab into card A
    • When card A is focused, hit the down arrow to toggle the card's background color
    • Tab into card B
    • When card B is focused, hit the down arrow to toggle the card's background color
  2. Screen reader accessibility
    • Turn on your screen reader
    • Tab into each card again and hit the down arrow to toggle the card's background color
